title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 185.4 - Promotion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 185.4 - Promotion

State Regulations
(a) For the
specific purpose of promoting the migratory bird program and the sale of prints
and stamps, 250 artist signed and numbered prints from each issue year, known
as Conservation Edition prints, will be produced by the department or its
contractor or contractors. Prints number one through seven will be used by the
department for promotional purposes. The remaining Conservation Edition prints
may be donated for auction or raffle to not-for-profit organizations supportive
of migratory bird conservation upon written request. Requests for prints for
such purpose must be in writing on the organization's letterhead stationery, stating the organization's purpose and goals and the date of the event at which
the print or prints will be auctioned. (b) The department reserves the right to
limit or deny an organization's request for migratory bird products where the
numbers requested exceed the available supply or where the department finds
that the proposed use of such products may be inconsistent with the purposes
and policies set forth in section
11-0303
of the Environmental

Conservation Law. (c) A total of no
more than 100 posters and 100 pins from each issue year will be reserved for
use by, and may be made available to department staff, employees of other State
agencies, landowners and project coordinators or others who assist the
department in promoting the program or acquiring or enhancing migratory bird
habitat. Posters and pins made available to State employees are for purpose of
display to the public at promotional events and otherwise to promote the
program. (d) The first and last
stamp sheet for each issue year will be reserved for historical records and
promotional purposes. These sheets of 30 Mint stamps each shall not be sold or
destroyed. (e) One full sheet of 30
mint and one full sheet of 30 double barred stamps may be used for the purpose
of promoting the migratory bird program. No other stamps may be used for this
purpose. (f) The department in its
discretion may enter into agreements permitting reproduction of the print
design for products other than stamps and art prints. Use of such designs must
be shown to promote awareness of the migratory bird program and distribution of
each individual final product must be accompanied by an appropriate statement
about the program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
185.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
